mapper.select: select juso_gu_code as jusoGuCode, juso_gu_name as jusoGuName from juso_gu_tbl where juso_gu_code like #{jusoCityCode}||'%' order by juso_gu_name asc
select juso_dong_code as jusoDongCode, juso_dong_name as jusoDongName from juso_dong_tbl where juso_dong_code like #{jusoGuCode}||'%' order by juso_dong_name asc
